Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
PumpkinScript = script:WaitForChild("PumpkinScript")
ReloadTime = 5 Duration = 20
Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not Humanoid or not Humanoid.Parent or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end Tool.Enabled = false Handle.Transparency = 1 RottenPumpkin = Handle:Clone() RottenPumpkin.Transparency = 0 RottenPumpkin.Size = Vector3.new(1.5, 1.75, 1.5) RottenPumpkin.CanCollide = true RottenPumpkin:FindFirstChild("Mesh").MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=181316165" RottenPumpkin.Name = "RottenPumpkin" local PointLight = Instance.new("PointLight") PointLight.Brightness = 10 PointLight.Color = BrickColor.new("Really red").Color PointLight.Enabled = false PointLight.Parent = RottenPumpkin local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) BodyGyro.cframe = RottenPumpkin.CFrame BodyGyro.Parent = RottenPumpkin local PumkinScriptClone = PumpkinScript:Clone() local Creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator.Name = "Creator" Creator.Value = Player Creator.Parent = RottenPumpkin PumkinScriptClone.Disabled = false PumkinScriptClone.Parent = RottenPumpkin Debris:AddItem(RottenPumpkin, (Duration + 3)) RottenPumpkin.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") RottenPumpkin.CFrame = Handle.CFrame Debris:AddItem(RottenPumpkin, Duration) wait((Duration + ReloadTime)) Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end end
function Unequipped() Handle.Transparency = 0 end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Pumpkin = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
PointLight = Pumpkin:WaitForChild("PointLight")
Creator = Pumpkin:WaitForChild("Creator").Value BlackoutScript = script:WaitForChild("BlackoutScript")
StinkMeshes = {181316184, 181316202, 181316221, 181316236} StinkTexture = 179155958
StinkLine = Instance.new("Part") StinkLine.Name = "StinkLine" StinkLine.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block StinkLine.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic StinkLine.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth StinkLine.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth StinkLine.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom StinkLine.Size = Vector3.new(0.25, 1, 0.25) StinkLine.CanCollide = false StinkLine.Locked = true StinkLine.Anchored = false StinkMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") StinkMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh StinkMesh.TextureId = tostring("http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. StinkTexture) StinkMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) StinkMesh.Parent = StinkLine
StinkLines = { {Position = {X = -0.5, Z = 0}}, {Position = {X = -0.25, Z = 0.25}}, {Position = {X = 0, Z = 0.25}}, {Position = {X = -0.25, Z = -0.25}}, {Position = {X = 0, Z = -0.25}}, {Position = {X = 0.25, Z = 0}}, {Position = {X = 0.5, Z = 0}} }
MaxRadius = 5
wait(1.5)
PointLight.Range = MaxRadius PointLight.Enabled = true
for i, v in pairs(Pumpkin:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") and v.Name == "StinkLine" then v:Destroy() end end
function CheckTableForInstance(Table, Instance) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if v == Instance then return true end end return false end
function EmitStink() local StinkLineChosen = StinkLines[math.random(1, #StinkLines)] if not StinkLineChosen.StinkLine or not StinkLineChosen.StinkLine.Parent then local NewStinkLine = StinkLine:Clone() NewStinkLine:FindFirstChild("Mesh").MeshId = tostring("http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. StinkMeshes[math.random(1, #StinkMeshes)]) local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Parent = NewStinkLine Weld.Part0 = NewStinkLine Weld.Part1 = Pumpkin local Rotation = math.random(1, 2) Weld.C1 = CFrame.new(StinkLineChosen.Position.X, ((Pumpkin.Size.Y / 2)), StinkLineChosen.Position.Z) * CFrame.Angles(0, ((Rotation == 1 and 0) or math.pi), 0) StinkLineChosen.StinkLine = NewStinkLine StinkLineChosen.Weld = Weld NewStinkLine.Parent = Pumpkin else if StinkLineChosen.Weld.C1.Y > 1.5 then if StinkLineChosen.StinkLine and StinkLineChosen.StinkLine.Parent then StinkLineChosen.StinkLine:Destroy() end else StinkLineChosen.Weld.C1 = StinkLineChosen.Weld.C1 + Vector3.new(0, (math.random(1, 25) * 0.01), 0) end end end
function GetPlayersNearby(Radius) local IgnoreObjects = {(((Creator and Creator.Parent and Creator.Character and Creator.Character.Parent) and Creator.Character) or nil)} local NegativePartRadius = Vector3.new(Radius, Radius, Radius) local PositivePartRadius = Vector3.new(Radius, (Pumpkin.Size.Y / 2), Radius) local Parts = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList(Region3.new(Pumpkin.CFrame.p - NegativePartRadius, Pumpkin.CFrame.p + PositivePartRadius), IgnoreObjects, 100) local Humanoids = {} for i, v in pairs(Parts) do if v and v.Parent then local character = v.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and not CheckTableForInstance(Humanoids, humanoid) then local ForceFieldExists = false for i, v in pairs(character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ForceField") then ForceFieldExists = true end end if not ForceFieldExists then table.insert(Humanoids, humanoid) end end end end return Humanoids end
function Blackout() local HumanoidsNearby = GetPlayersNearby(MaxRadius) for i, v in pairs(HumanoidsNearby) do if v:IsA("Humanoid") and v.Parent then local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(v.Parent) if player then local PlayerBlackoutScript = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindFirstChild(player.Name .. BlackoutScript.Name) if player and not PlayerBlackoutScript and not v:FindFirstChild("ClientScript") then local BlackoutScriptClone = BlackoutScript:Clone() BlackoutScriptClone.Name = (player.Name .. BlackoutScript.Name) local Creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator.Name = "Creator" Creator.Value = player Creator.Parent = BlackoutScriptClone BlackoutScriptClone.Disabled = false local UnconsciousDuration = Instance.new("NumberValue") UnconsciousDuration.Name = "UnconsciousDuration" UnconsciousDuration.Value = 2 UnconsciousDuration.Parent = BlackoutScriptClone BlackoutScriptClone.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") elseif PlayerBlackoutScript then local UnconsciousDuration = PlayerBlackoutScript:FindFirstChild("UnconsciousDuration") if UnconsciousDuration then UnconsciousDuration.Value = 2 end end end end end end
if Creator and Creator.Parent and Creator:IsA("Player") then Creator.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Character" and not Creator.Character.Parent then Pumpkin:Destroy() end end) end
Spawn(function() while true do EmitStink() Blackout() wait(0.01) end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
ClientScript = script:FindFirstChild("ClientScript") FixBackpack = script:FindFirstChild("FixBackpack")
Creator = script:FindFirstChild("Creator") UnconsciousDuration = script:FindFirstChild("UnconsciousDuration")
function DestroyScript() local FixBackpackClone = FixBackpack:Clone() FixBackpackClone.Disabled = false if Player then local Backpack = Player:FindFirstChild("Backpack") if Backpack then FixBackpackClone.Parent = Backpack end elseif Character then FixBackpackClone.Parent = Character end Debris:AddItem(script, 2) end
if not Creator or not UnconsciousDuration then DestroyScript() return end
if not ClientScript or not FixBackpack or not Creator.Value or not Creator.Value.Parent or not Creator.Value:IsA("Player") or UnconsciousDuration.Value <= 0 then DestroyScript() return end
ClientScript = ClientScript:Clone() FixBackpack = FixBackpack:Clone() Player = Creator.Value
Character = Player.Character if not Character then DestroyScript() return end
Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end
Humanoid.Died:connect(function() DestroyScript() end)
Player.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Character" and not Player.Character then DestroyScript() end end)
ServerConnectionObject = Instance.new("ObjectValue") ServerConnectionObject.Name = "ServerConnection" ServerConnectionObject.Parent = script
ServerConnection = Instance.new("ObjectValue") ServerConnection.Name = "ServerScript" ServerConnection.Value = ServerConnectionObject ServerConnection.Parent = ClientScript
ClientScriptClone = ClientScript:Clone() ClientScriptClone.Disabled = false ClientScriptClone.Parent = Humanoid
Spawn(function() while true do wait(1) UnconsciousDuration.Value = (UnconsciousDuration.Value - 1) if UnconsciousDuration.Value <= 0 then DestroyScript() break end end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
wait()
Humanoid = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
Character = Humanoid.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character)
Animations = { Faint = script:FindFirstChild("Faint"), Unconscious = script:FindFirstChild("Unconscious") }
ScreenFog = script:FindFirstChild("ScreenFog")
Unconscious = true
function DestroyScript() Unconscious = false if Face and Face.Parent and OriginalFace then Face.Texture = OriginalFace end if UnconsciousAnim then UnconsciousAnim:Stop() end if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end if PlayerGui and ScreenFog and ScreenFogFrame then Debris:AddItem(ScreenFog, 2) Spawn(function() for i = 1, ((1 - 0.2) * 50) do ScreenFogFrame.Transparency = (ScreenFogFrame.Transparency + 0.02) wait(0.01) end ScreenFogFrame.Transparency = 1 end) ScreenFog.Parent = PlayerGui end Debris:AddItem(ScreenFog, 3) StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, true) Debris:AddItem(script, 2) end
if not Player or not ScreenFog or not Animations.Faint or not Animations.Unconscious then DestroyScript() return end
BlackoutScript = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindFirstChild(Player.Name .. "BlackoutScript")
if not BlackoutScript then DestroyScript() return end
ScreenFog = ScreenFog:Clone() ScreenFogFrame = ScreenFog:FindFirstChild("Frame")
PlayerGui = Player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if PlayerGui and ScreenFog and ScreenFogFrame then Spawn(function() ScreenFogFrame.Transparency = 1 for i = 1, ((1 - 0.1) * 100) do ScreenFogFrame.Transparency = (ScreenFogFrame.Transparency - 0.01) wait(0.01) end ScreenFogFrame.Transparency = 0.1 end) ScreenFog.Parent = PlayerGui end
UnequipTools = Character.ChildAdded:connect(function(Child) Delay(0, function() if Unconscious then Humanoid:UnequipTools() end end) end)
Head = Character:FindFirstChild("Head") if Head then Face = Head:FindFirstChild("face") OriginalFace = Face.Texture Face.Texture = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=15395252" end
Humanoid.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Jump" then Humanoid.Jump = false end end)
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0
Humanoid:UnequipTools() StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, false)
FaintAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations.Faint) if FaintAnim then FaintAnim:Play() wait(1) UnconsciousAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations.Unconscious) if UnconsciousAnim then UnconsciousAnim:Play() end end
BlackoutScript.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not BlackoutScript.Parent then DestroyScript() end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Debris = game:GetService("Debris") StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, true)
Debris:AddItem(script, 2)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = Value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(Value.FadeTime, Value.Weight, Value.Speed) elseif Mode == "StopAnimation" and Value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end elseif Mode == "Preload" and Value then ContentProvider:Preload(Value) elseif Mode == "PlaySound" and Value then Value:Play() elseif Mode == "StopSound" and Value then Value:Stop() end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) pcall(function() local ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) return ServerReturn end) end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end Animations = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
